snippet.title: NHL 23 Official Presentation Deep Dive Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order NHL 23 X-Factor Edition: http://x.ea.com/74523

NHL® 23 will mark the second EA SPORTS™ NHL title on Frostbite and along with this powerful game-engine comes several amazing upgrades to the presentation and look of NHL 23.

A new interactive Stanley Cup celebration gives you additional agency when it’s time to recognize their big win in Franchise mode. The iconic hattrick hat throw returns, along with the ability for you to customize your team's hattrick celebrations. A series of new game-ending animations for those high-adrenaline moments like come-from-behind, OT, shootout, and playoff game victories.

In a complete overhaul of crowd intelligence and audio, the folks in the stands now understand and react to what’s happening in the game. Thanks to our new Crowd Engagement Score algorithm, expect to be showered in cheers after winning a tense shootout and booed into the penalty box when you foul an opponent on their home ice.

In addition to these improvements we’ve added all new on-ice projections, dynamic AR leaderboards, and more. Learn more about all the changes: http://x.ea.com/74524

Subscribe for more NHL 23 Trailers: https://bit.ly/3kF5rTK
Follow us on TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@easportsnhl

#NHL23 #Presentation
